SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class ClientQueueHandler

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.ClientQueueHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApiHandler
public class ClientQueueHandler extends Object implements ApiHandler
Handler for the /client/queue endpoint.

Accepts JSON/JSON5 case definitions or raw EML uploads and enqueues them as RelaySession objects for later delivery.

Supports two input modes:

  • JSON body: Full case definition with envelopes, routing, etc.
  • Raw upload: EML file with mail/rcpt query parameters.

Optional query parameters for overrides:

  • protocol: Override relay protocol (default from server config).
  • mailbox: Override Dovecot folder delivery target.

      public String getPath()
      Description copied from interface: ApiHandler
      Returns the URL path this handler is registered for.

      The path should start with a forward slash (e.g., "/client/send"). The handler will receive all requests matching this path prefix.

      Specified by:
